subject: Tasks complete: messaging hardening + viz scaffold + dashboard SQLite
content: Done: messaging.py now validates InterAgentMessage, adds seen_by/metadata and ack_message; msg_tool supports --from/--reply-to/--metadata. Dashboard now reads tasks.db and shows PLAN/RESULT from workspace with frontmatter. Added Vite+React Sigma.js scaffold under src/dashboard/viz/ with graphology + sigma and subgraph fetch skeleton. MCP/Neo4j integration not touched.
